document.full_text: pittsburgh penguins forward matt cooke has been suspended for the rest of the regular season and the first round of the playoffs for his elbow to the head of new york rangers defenseman ryan mcdonagh, the nhl said.
document.title: cooke banned for rest of regular season for head hit
lines_and_colors: pittsburgh penguins forward matt cooke has been suspended for the rest of the regular season and the first round of the playoffs for his elbow to the head of new york rangers defenseman ryan mcdonagh, the nhl said.
